name: Web SkyInc
description: SkyInc is a weather forecast software based on geographic locations. It can automatically locate to your city. SkyInc can forecast local weather conditions, temperature, moisture, UV intensity and so on based on your geographic location. You can change the background image freely.

en_US.description: SkyInc is a weather forecast software based on geographic locations. It can automatically locate to your city. SkyInc can forecast local weather conditions, temperature, moisture, UV intensity and so on based on your geographic location. You can change the background image freely.
en_US.name: Web SkyInc

zh_CN.description: SkyInc是一款基于地理位置的天气预报软件，它可以自动定位到您所在的城市。SkyInc根据您的地理位置来预报当地的天气情况、温度、湿度、紫外线强度等，同时您还可以自由更换背景图片。
zh_CN.name: SkyInc网页版
